Home > Restaurants > The Mariposa

The Mariposa

Contemporary American $$$$ Silver Lake Village

Zagat's #1 rated restaurant in Utah, located at 8,100 feet elevation in Silver Lake Lodge. Offers an intimate tasting room dining experience with 6- and 8-course menus highlighting decadent ingredients and seasonal local products. Only operates during ski season, making reservations highly coveted.

Must-Try Dishes

  • 6 & 8-Course Tasting Menus
  • Wild Mushroom Tart
  • Burrata Salad w/ heirloom tomatoes
  • Nori-Sesame Seared Ahi
  • Famous Chocolate Snowballs
  • Pan-Roasted Sea Scallops

Features & Amenities

Tasting Menus Mid Mountain Location Fireplaces Seasonal Operation Wine Spectator Award Private Dining Vegan Options

Perfect For

Special Occasion Celebration Fine Dining Experience

Restaurant Information

Hours

Wed-Sun 5:30-9pm (Ski Season Only)

Contact

7600 Royal Street, Silver Lake Lodge, Park City, UT 84060
